Metadata.title: FashionExport - Premium Apparel Manufacturer
Metadata.description: Leading garment manufacturer and exporter for global brands.

Hero.title: Premium Apparel Manufacturing
Hero.subtitle: We provide high-quality garment manufacturing and export services to global brands. From design to delivery, we are your trusted partner in fashion.

Features.title: Why Choose Us
Features.subtitle: Everything you need to scale your fashion brand
Features.qualityDesc: Strict quality control at every stage of production ensuring zero defects.
Features.logisticsDesc: Efficient shipping solutions to over 50 countries with real-time tracking.
Features.materialsDesc: Sourcing the finest fabrics and accessories from certified suppliers.

Footer.description: Premium quality apparel manufacturer and exporter. Connecting global fashion brands with top-tier manufacturing.

Contact.title: Contact Us
Contact.subtitle: Get in touch with our team for inquiries and quotes.
Contact.name: Name
Contact.success: Thank you for your inquiry! We will get back to you soon.

About.title: About Us
About.description: FashionExport is a premier garment manufacturer dedicated to bringing your fashion vision to life. Since 2009, we have been the silent partner behind many successful global fashion brands.

values.qualityDesc: We maintain the highest standards of quality control at every stage of production, ensuring that every garment meets international standards.
values.customerDesc: Our clients are our partners. We work closely with brands to understand their vision and deliver products that exceed expectations.
values.globalDesc: With a robust logistics network, we ensure timely delivery of products to any corner of the globe.
values.heritageDesc: Built on a legacy of craftsmanship, we combine traditional techniques with modern technology.

Process.title: Manufacturing Process
Process.description: Our streamlined process ensures efficiency and quality from start to finish.

Sustainability.title: Sustainability
Sustainability.description: We are committed to sustainable manufacturing practices that protect our planet.

Privacy.title: Privacy Policy
Privacy.intro: At FashionExport, we take your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you use our website.
Privacy.dataCollectionText: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you fill out a contact form, request a quote, or communicate with us. This may include your name, email address, phone number, and company details.
Privacy.dataUsageText: We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our services, to respond to your inquiries, and to communicate with you about our products and services.
Privacy.contactText: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at contact@fashionexport.com.

Terms.title: Terms of Service
Terms.intro: Please read these Terms of Service carefully before using the FashionExport website operated by us.
Terms.usageText: We will provide their services to you, which are subject to the conditions stated below in this document. Every time you visit this website, use its services or make a purchase, you accept the following conditions.
Terms.intellectualPropertyText: Content published on this website (digital downloads, images, texts, graphics, logos) is the property of FashionExport and/or its content creators and protected by international copyright laws.
Terms.liabilityText: FashionExport shall not be held liable for any damages that may arise from your use or inability to use the materials on this website.

CookieConsent.message: We use cookies to enhance your experience. By continuing to visit this site you agree to our use of cookies.
